#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 5000001

int main()
{
        long i,j,t,m,n;
        long long sum;
        char *a = (char *) malloc(MAX * sizeof(char));

        a[0]=a[1]=0;
        for(i=2;i<MAX;i++)
        a[i]=1;

        for(i=2; i<=sqrt(MAX); i++)
        {
                if(a[i]==1)
                {
                        for(j=2*i; j<=MAX; j+=i)
                        a[j]=0;
                }
        }

        cin >> t;
        while(t--)
        {
                sum = 0;
                cin >> m >> n;

                if(m > n)
                {
                        cout << "0\n";
                        continue;
                }
                for(i=m;i<=n;i++)
                if(a[i]==1)
                sum += i;

                cout << sum << endl;
        }

        return 0;
}
